knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rethinking)
library(patchwork)
library(ggdag) # uses gg plot to draw the dag
library(dagitty) # creates the dag object
data(Howell1) # example data set for this chapter
```

```{r}
ahw_dag = dagitty(
  "dag {
    age -> height
    age -> weight
    height -> weight
  }")
dag_plot = ggdag(ahw_dag, layout = "stress") + 
  theme_dag()
```

```{r}
df = Howell1
df = df |> filter(age < 13)
age_height_plot = ggplot(df, aes(x = weight, y = height, color = age)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Weight (kg)", y = "Height (cm)", color = "Age") +
  theme_classic()
  age_height_plot + dag_plot
```
